document.full_text: protesters spilled into northern afghan streets on thursday, a day after at least 14 people were killed and scores wounded in wild protests that underscored deep tensions between afghans and foreign troops.
document.title: police open fire to disperse afghan protests
lines_and_colors: protesters spilled into northern afghan streets on thursday, a day after at least 14 people were killed and scores wounded in wild protests that underscored deep tensions between afghans and foreign troops.
